description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=1/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. A new 8-bit styled horizontal shooter! Up to 8 stages of pure shooting action. Ofcourse playing all alone is no fun when you have friends over, so you're friend can join too! After a run, submit your score to the online and local highscores so you can compete with the world! Try beating the highest score, or even finishing all 8 stages!
